SELECT uu.* ,(SELECT mem_name FROM tbl_member WHERE mem_no=uu.send_mem_no) AS send_mem_name ,(SELECT mem_name FROM tbl_member WHERE mem_no=uu.recv_mem_no) AS recv_mem_name ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MESSAGE WHERE RECV_MEM_NO=#{value} AND RECV_TIME IS NULL) AS unreadCount FROM tbl_message uu , (SELECT A.msg_group_no , MAX(A.send_time)send_time FROM (SELECT * FROM tbl_message WHERE send_mem_no=#{value} OR recv_mem_no=#{value} ) A GROUP BY A.msg_group_no )zz WHERE zz.msg_group_no=uu.msg_group_no AND zz.send_time=uu.send_time AND uu.recv_remove_time IS NULL ORDER BY uu.send_time DESC , uu.recv_time DESC
